mapper.select: SELECT SUM(p.`lg_av_amount`) FROM g_share g INNER JOIN g_share_log h ON g.`share_id` = h.`share_id` INNER JOIN g_pd_log p ON p.`lg_id` = h.`log_id` WHERE g.`share_status` = 1 AND g.`share_state` = 0 AND g.`share_id` = #{shareId} AND p.`lg_type` = 'task_income' ORDER BY g.`share_id` DESC
